review: I have to say, I'm loving this thing! I have a Roku box in my room, and just recently purchased the stick for the living room so my elderly mother can enjoy her nature and old tv shows on Netflix and Amazon. We also have a Sony dvd player with apps, but it failed to work the way I expected - I have *never* been able to get Netflix working on it, so it only works for one of the apps we needed - Amazon. I was on the phone and online with Netflix customer support for hours, with no luck at all getting it working, so basically, it's just a glorified DVD player now, which we will rarely use, because now we have the stick! :-)Loading time for the apps is a little slow, but I mean, seriously...what is 30-45 seconds out of your life? It's not that critical and the apps DO load, so that's all I care about. I'm sure if it was right on top of my wifi router, it might load faster, but being 2 rooms away, I don't think the load time is that bad.The only issue we've experienced is when Netflix goes down or screws up by removing programming (like they did last week), or my internet connection gets a little flaky, which it does on occasion for everyone, I'm sure.All in all, great experience with this device.  Super easy to install, no issues there, and really easy to use.
